app.Functions module¶

mod:Physical 모듈

description¶

this module has information about PF, VF. testable use objects instantiated from this class.

class app.Functions.Function[source]¶

Bases: object

  • Function class

parent class of VF,PF. All Function class must implement this class.

example :
>>> class PhysicalFunction(Function)
...
LBA = 65536¶
getMember()[source]¶

To help other class initialize variations

Returns:return tuple of member variations
example :
>>> port, targetNum, numOfQueue, queueDepth, LBA = Function.getMember()
makeQueue()[source]¶

Make queue of functions. Number of Queue is member variation numOfQueue. Queue depth is member variation queueDepth. when function object is instantiated, this function is called from constructor. :return: example :

>>> somefunction.makeQueue()
numOfQueue = None¶
port = None¶
queueDepth = None¶
targetNum = None¶
class app.Functions.PhysicalFunction[source]¶

Bases: app.Functions.Function

  • PhysicalFunction class

This class have information about physical function. If user wants to make virtual function, this class make virtual function.

getMember()[source]¶

To help other class initialize variations. In PhysicalFunction, it returns vfuncrion list

Returns:return tuple of member variations
example :
>>> port, targetNum, numOfQueue, queueDepth, LBA, vfunction_list = somepf.getMember()
numOfVF = None¶
vfEnable()[source]¶

vfEnable method Instantiate as many as NumOfVF. :return: list that have instances of VF. example :

>>>vflist = somePF.vfEnable()
vfunction_list = []¶
class app.Functions.VirtualFunction(memTuple, target_number, parent)[source]¶

Bases: app.Functions.Function

  • VirtualFunction class

This class have information about virtual function. This class have numOfPhy, member variable that indicate parent physical function.

getMember()[source]¶

To help other class initialize variations. In VirtualFunction, it returns mother Physical function

Returns:return tuple of member variations
example :
>>> port, targetNum, numOfQueue, queueDepth, LBA, numOfphy = somevf.getMember()
numOfPhy = None¶
